title: Entity Type Column Schema
description: A definition of the entity type column

dataType.description: The data type for this column.

labelAlias.description: The identifier used for a localized label/name for this column.

visibleByDefault.description: Indicates if the column should be shown by default when the entity is viewed.

values.description: Array of values for this column

idColumnName.description: Name of the corresponding ID column, if this column contains the value of an ID.

source.description: Reference to the root entity type column, from where the values of this column are sourced.

valueGetter.description: Configuration defining how to fetch values of this column from the underlying datasource.

filterValueGetter.description: Configuration defining how to filter values of this column from the underlying datasource when indexed values aren't very user-friendly.
